i was looking for a free converter too. but the only free ones seem to be for mac.
Its not free, but TransType from FontLab ( [http://www.fontlab.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20131103225013/http:/www.fontlab.com/)) does a good job and converts both ways, in TT and PS formats.
Try CrossFont. Shareware. It converts free in one by one mode.
